description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the elevation of privilege vulnerability in the Windows Search Service (CVE-2024-30033):

1. Download and install the KB5037770 update for Windows 11 or the appropriate KB5037768 update for Windows 10.
2. Ensure the system is restarted after the update installation.

**Details**:
- This fix addresses improper link resolution before file access, which could allow an attacker to elevate their privileges on the system.
- For manual installation, download the relevant update packages from:
  - Windows 11: [KB5037770](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037770)
  - Windows 10: [KB5037768](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037768)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is running the specified build versions.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
